name: Balloon
description: Inflate a balloon and pop it!
notes: Tried to build a calculator, but failed badly because I didn't know how to structure react components properly. It was confusing to figure out how to edit the total from a parent component. Then time was running out, so I made a simple balloon app.

name: Binary Light Switches
description: A light switch representation of a 4 bit binary number.

name: Money Ticker
description: Money clicker game. The more you click, the more money you make!

name: List Search
description: Search/filter through a list of things about me!

name: Typing Game
description: Type all the letters that appears on the screen or else...

name: Simple Animation
description: Click on a tile and watch it change colors!

name: Random Quotes
description: Get a random quote from movies, books and celebrities.

name: Love Match
description: See if your name matches well with your crush ;)

name: Not-to-do List
description: To do or not to do? That is the question.

name: Day Count Down
description: Calculate how long ago or how long till another date from now.

name: Dice Roll
description: Roll a die, or two, or three! (or more!?)

name: Portfolio v1
description: A redux gallery of react apps by moi.

name: Guess the President
description: Test how American you are by guessing the names of the presidents.

name: Portfolio v2
description: Same portfolio, but now with routing! No more slow loads!

name: Portfolio v2.1
description: Added a controller header to help traverse through the projects.
